description: Industry-leading exemplar websites used for comparative analysis. Benchmarks are discovered via Google Maps, web design awards, and manual curation, then analyzed once and cached for repeated comparison.

columns.name: industry
columns.description: Primary industry category (dentistry, restaurant, fitness, etc.)

columns.name: benchmark_tier
columns.description: Tier classification: 'national' (award-winning, aspirational), 'regional' (top local performers), 'local' (direct competitors)

columns.name: awards
columns.description: Array of awards/recognition (e.g., [{award: 'Awwwards Site of Day', date: '2024-10-15', url: '...'}])

columns.name: analysis_results
columns.description: Cached full analysis results from Analysis Engine (all 6 analyzers)

columns.name: business_intelligence
columns.description: Extracted business data (employee count, pricing, features, etc.)

columns.name: design_strengths
columns.description: Extracted design/UI strengths from visual-strengths-extractor (desktop/mobile strengths, color palette, layout patterns, conversion optimizations)

columns.name: seo_strengths
columns.description: Extracted SEO best practices from technical-strengths-extractor (meta tag patterns, schema markup, keyword strategy, internal linking)

columns.name: content_strengths
columns.description: Extracted content strengths from technical-strengths-extractor (heading hierarchy, readability, CTA placement, content structure)

columns.name: social_strengths
columns.description: Extracted social proof strategies from social-strengths-extractor (review integration, testimonial format, trust signals, platform usage)

columns.name: accessibility_strengths
columns.description: Extracted accessibility best practices from accessibility-strengths-extractor (ARIA usage, contrast ratios, keyboard navigation, WCAG compliance)

columns.name: analyzed_at
columns.description: When the website was analyzed (for cache invalidation)

columns.name: is_active
columns.description: Whether this benchmark is currently active/valid

columns.name: notes
columns.description: Admin notes about why this is a good/bad benchmark
